None.Name: Blessed Onslaught
None.Description: Activate to teleport to a hostile ground unit within a 100m range. Requires the target to be within a 20m range of an own ground entity. Lost Warlord will gain an Ice Shield that absorbs up to 2200 damage for 15 second after having been teleported. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Revenant's Doom
None.Description: Activate to bestow the unit with a curse that will make it resurrect in case it dies. The resurrected revenant will only be a shadow of its former self but it will be endowed with the same abilities and equal in strength. After 20 seconds the revenant will then die once and for all. May only be triggered once.
